医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
稀有菌株产生突破性化合物来对抗乙型肝炎科学家们从一种罕见的菌株中发现了新的抗病毒化合物，为靶向乙型肝炎病毒提供了一种新方法。这些化合物通过改变受感染细胞的膜通透性发挥作用，导致未成熟病毒颗粒的释放，这种机制与目前的乙肝治疗不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Rare-bacterial-strain-yields-groundwriting-compounds-to-combat-hepatitis-B.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Rare-bacterial-strain-yields-groundwriting-compounds-to-combat-hepatitis-B.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6ab6386-5620-4506-95ad-5de9fee30caf Tue, 28 Nov 2023 19:30:00 -0500 Rare bacterial strain yields groundbreaking compounds to combat hepatitis B
孤独会导致糖尿病吗？新研究揭示体力活动和体重指数的作用研究调查了孤独感和糖尿病之间的关系，发现体力活动和体重指数可以调节这种联系，但饮食质量却不能。它强调了孤独、生活方式因素和糖尿病风险之间复杂的相互作用，强调需要采取有针对性的干预措施来改善心理和身体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Can-loneiness-lead-to-diabetes-New-study-reveals-the-role-of-physical-activity-and-BMI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Can-loneiness-lead-to-diabetes-New-study-reveals-the-role-of-physical-activity-and-BMI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be59403-a60b-4c73-acd4-6d3ae3edc9b9 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 19:02:00 -0500 Can loneliness lead to diabetes? New study reveals the role of physical activity and BMI
需要社会支持来减少获得心脏康复的障碍参加第三届 Jim Pattison-Mazankowski 艾伯塔心脏研究所心脏康复研讨会（班夫，2023 年 4 月 21 日至 23 日）的著名心血管康复专家观察到，尽管心脏康复有益于不同的患者群体，并为复发事件提供最具成本效益的预防，全球范围内它的利用严重不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Social-support-needed-to-reduce-the-barriers-in-accessing-cardiac-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Social-support-needed-to-reduce-the-barriers-in-accessing-cardiac-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cab18857-0d4b-47ba-9603-0e437596724e Tue, 28 Nov 2023 14:34:28 -0500 Social support needed to reduce the barriers in accessing cardiac rehabilitation
新的心脏类器官模型可能会彻底改变药物开发和毒理学研究心脏病每年夺去 1800 万人的生命，但新疗法的开发面临瓶颈：迄今为止，尚不存在整个人类心脏的生理模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/New-heart-organoid-model-could-revolutionize-drug-development-and-毒理学-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/New-heart-organoid-model-could-revolutionize-drug-development-and-毒理学-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb7b36cb-1147-4608-bda4-9f24d9e1319c Tue, 28 Nov 2023 14:24:55 -0500 New heart organoid model could revolutionize drug development and toxicology studies
UKHSA 和英国气象局发布感冒健康警报UKHSA 和英国气象局已在英格兰 3 个地区发布了琥珀色感冒健康警报 (CHA)。英格兰的两个地区也发行了黄色 CHA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/UKHSA-and-the-Met-Office-issue-cold-health-alerts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/UKHSA-and-the-Met-Office-issue-cold-health-alerts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbd026de-58f0-45f7-b17a-9c3a85d5fe9f Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:59:15 -0500 UKHSA and the Met Office issue cold-health alerts
俄亥俄州立韦克斯纳医疗中心因阿司匹林剂量研究获得 1400 万美元奖金俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心和医学院的一个研究团队已获得以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 批准的 1400 万美元奖金，以研究每日服用较高剂量的阿司匹林是否能更有效地降低风险一些孕妇出现危险的血压并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Ohio-State-Wexner-Medical-Center-wins-2414-million-award-for-aspirin-dose-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Ohio-State-Wexner-Medical-Center-wins-2414-million-award-for-aspirin-dose-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bdad44c-55ee-4c24-a7ef-c98e5c768918 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:55:12 -0500 Ohio State Wexner Medical Center wins $14 million award for aspirin dose study
放射治疗可以改善心力衰竭患者的心功能圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的心脏病专家和放射肿瘤学家率先使用放射治疗；通常用于对抗癌症的策略 -；治疗患有危及生命的异常心律（称为室性心动过速）的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Radiation-therapy-could-improve-cardiac-function-in-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Radiation-therapy-could-improve-cardiac-function-in-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c09a950f-8b26-48da-b53d-3f34e799dd7d Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:47:39 -0500 Radiation therapy could improve cardiac function in heart failure
科学家发现高危儿童白血病的新治疗靶点圣裘德儿童研究医院的科学家全面鉴定了与高危儿童白血病相关的蛋白质直接调控的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Scientists-uncover-new-therapeutic-targets-for-high-risk-pediatric-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Scientists-uncover-new-therapeutic-targets-for-high-risk-pediatric-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89e1603c-6eab-4234-9dda-16e93ef2334e Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:39:25 -0500 Scientists uncover new therapeutic targets for high-risk pediatric leukemia
新的皮质类器官更准确地代表人类大脑马克西玛公主儿科肿瘤中心和 Hubrecht 研究所的研究人员生成的类器官可以更准确地捕获大脑皮层的基本特征，皮层是人类大脑及其发育的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/New-cortex-organoids-more-accurately-represent-the- human-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/New-cortex-organoids-more-accurately-represent-the- human-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c6ac17b-4526-44dc-a067-2e7df495fda4 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:26:15 -0500 New cortex organoids more accurately represent the human brain
研究表明足球头球与大脑微结构和功能下降有关本周在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 年会上提出的新研究表明，足球头球（球员用头击球）与两年内大脑微观结构和功能的显着下降有关时期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Research-links-soccer-heading-to-decline-in-the-brain-microstruct-and-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Research-links-soccer-heading-to-decline-in-the-brain-microstruct-and-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7954ff91-c20d-4eeb-a7ce-91d9600168d1 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:09:51 -0500 Research links soccer heading to decline in the brain microstructure and function
